references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
mathematica: Sin[ Tanh[ x ] ] (* Odd Part *)With[{nn = 60}, Take[CoefficientList[Series[Sin[Tanh[x]], {x, 0, nn}], x] Range[0, nn - 1]!, {2, -1, 2}]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
